name: MINE
description:
Mine is a first-person horror in the backroom format, your task is to find a way out! You're not a fighter, you can only run. But be careful, the cave is not empty, there are terrible monsters in it, eager to kill you.

Features:

The real horror of survival: You are not a fighter - if you want to survive the horrors, our only chance is to escape... or hide
Unpredictable enemies: Players cannot know when and from where the terrifying inhabitant will overtake them.
